dcterms:creator: Samuel R Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D Manning
dcterms:description: A large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, which includes pairs of sentences labeled for entailment, contradiction, and neutral relationships.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel Bowman
dcterms:description: A broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand and infer relationships between sentences.
dcterms:title: MultiNLI

dcterms:creator: Marco Marelli
Luisa Bentivogli
Marco Baroni
Raffaella Bernardi
Stefano Menini
Roberto Zamparelli
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating compositional distributional semantic models on full sentences through semantic relatedness and textual entailment.
dcterms:title: SICK

dcterms:creator: Sheng Zhang
Rachel Rudinger
Kevin Duh
Benjamin Van Durme
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on ordinal common-sense inference, which involves reasoning about the relationships between different statements based on common-sense knowledge.
dcterms:title: JOCI
